name: tarragon hat
notes:
the tarragon hat is a cozy, stylish crochet pattern that showcases the textured beauty of the bar stitch. its unique design offers a modern yet timeless look, making it perfect for cold weather wear or as a thoughtful handmade gift.

grab the matching scarf! [https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/tarragon-scarf][1]

this pattern is also available to view for free on my blog (with ads). by purchasing here, you're purchasing the ad-free, printable pdf download.

**what's included:**
5 page printable pdf download
written instructions for four sizes, toddler through adult, 16-23" head circumference
size chart
video stitch and full hat pattern tutorials

**pattern difficulty:**
easy

**construction:**
hat is worked from the bottom up, with ribbed brim added at the end.

**sizing & yardage:** (head circumference, yards)

toddler, 16-18", 165 yards
child 19-20", 185 yards
teen/small adult 21-22", 205 yards
adult 22-23", 229 yards

**yarn:**
wool of the andes worsted (#4) in mink heather (24279)
100% peruvian highland wool
50g/110yds

all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow.

all of my patterns are in us terms.

due to the nature of the pdf files sales, i will not refund any patterns. however, i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns.

you may sell what you produce from my patterns, but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole. my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make.
